briefTitle: A Multicenter, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Parallel Group-comparison Trial of Aripiprazole in the Treatment of Patients With Bipolar Disorder Experiencing a Manic or Mixed Episode
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Parallel Group-Comparison Trial of Aripiprazole in the Treatment of Patients With Bipolar Disorder Experiencing a Manic or Mixed Episode
summary: The primary objective of this trial is to evaluate the clinical efficacy and safety of aripiprazole in comparison to placebo in patients with Bipolar I Disorder experiencing a manic or mixed episode.
